title: Wonders in your own backyard. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: This film is designed to stimulate close and early observation. It shows a group of children finding a snail, grasshopper, earthworm, sowbug, spider, caterpillar and inchworm in their backyard. Suitable for upper primary level.
